医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究揭示了骨骼再生的性别差异在组织工程中，骨骼再生仍然是一个关键的挑战，无法预测的结果通常阻碍临床应用。当前的策略忽略了供体差异和生物性别等关键因素，这两者在骨折愈合中起着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-sex-differences-in-bone-regeneration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-sex-differences-in-bone-regeneration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87d0cebe-3BCA-4358-B442-CFDEA5871271 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 09:09:48 -0400 Study reveals sex differences in bone regeneration
口腔健康是女性疼痛障碍的关键因素悉尼大学的新研究表明，口腔健康状况不佳与女性偏头痛，腹部和身体疼痛的较高实例显着相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/Oral-Health-ehthy-emerges-aas-key-factor-in-womens-womens-pain-pain-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/oral-health-ehthy-emerges-aas-key-factor-in-womens-womens-pain-pain-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10A004A7-A4E6-46B4-AF38-589816BA03FC Wed, 09 Apr 2025 09:06:06 -0400 Oral health emerges as key factor in women's pain disorders
细胞细胞分析揭示了图雷特综合征的大脑变化在第一个全面的细胞细胞分析中，来自Tourette综合征的个体的脑组织，研究人员准确地指出了哪些细胞受到干扰以及它们的故障，揭示了如何受到疾病影响不同类型的脑细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/cell-cell-cell-analysis-reveals-reveals-brain-changes-in-tourette-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/cell-cell-cell-cell-analysis-reveals-reveals-brain-changes-in-tourette-in-tourette-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16b5514e-e7d1-409d-82ff-d82ff-d8f9de64bca2 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 08:56:50 -0400 Cell-by-cell analysis reveals brain changes in Tourette syndrome
神经器官提供了有关痴呆机制的洞察力俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心和医学院的研究人员发现了一种新的方法，即通过使用人类神经类器官（也称为“迷你脑”模型），来自额叶叶退化（FTLD）的患者，通过使用人类神经器官（也称为“迷你脑”模型）在神经变性中作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/neural-organoids-offer-insight-insto-into-mechanisms-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/neural-organoids-offer-insight-insight-into-into-mechanisms-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bacedad6-f200-4302-a4bd-9aff76d2e06e Wed, 09 Apr 2025 08:24:24 -0400 Neural organoids offer insight into mechanisms of dementia
化学疗法与乳腺癌患者大脑连通性的变化有关发表在《磁共振成像杂志》上的新研究发现了乳腺癌患者化疗期间大脑连通性的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/chemotherapy-linked-to-changes-in-changes-in-brain-connectivity-in-breast-cancer-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/chemotherapy-linked-to-changes-in-changes-in-brain-connectivity-in-breast-cancer-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=611d93d93d3-3295-4696-81eb-b284848efad9e Wed, 09 Apr 2025 07:50:45 -0400 Chemotherapy linked to changes in brain connectivity in breast cancer patients
牙齿和牙龈问题在英格兰的青少年足球运动员中常见在《开放访问杂志》中发表的研究BMJ开放运动和运动医学中，在英格兰的青少年（学院）职业足球运动员中，牙齿和口香糖问题的流行率很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tooth-and-and-gum-problems-common-among-among-teenage-footballers-in-england.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tooth-and-and-gum-problems-common-among-among-teenage-footballers-in-england.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebc3531d-0a32-41b0-41b0-810e-51610af34f5f Wed, 09 Apr 2025 07:29:00 -0400 Tooth and gum problems common among teenage footballers in England
新的医院计划可帮助阿片类药物患者出院后继续治疗一项新的研究发现，为患有阿片类药物使用障碍苦苦挣扎的住院患者一种治疗成瘾的药物使他们更有可能在出院后继续进行后续护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-hospital-program-helps-helps-pogram-pogragr-popioid-patients-patients-patients-pate--in-warteatment-warteatment-treatment-fater-discharge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-hospital-program-helps-helps-pogram-pogram-patient-patients-patients-patients-net-warteatment-warteatment-warterment-wartter-fater-discharge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1E4253E0-D2C2-4232-4232-922C-15B88677C443 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 07:20:49 -0400 New hospital program helps opioid patients stay in treatment after discharge
Sphere Bio扩展了Apac分布网络以加强区域的存在Sphere Bio是基于Picodroplet的主要小流体提供功能单细胞分析和隔离的主要提供商，今天宣布了其Apac分销商网络的显着扩展。这一发展标志着该公司全球商业战略的关键里程碑，以满足对下一代单细胞分析平台的需求不断增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/sphere-bio-expands-apac-apac-distribution-network-network-to-strengthen-presenthen-presence-in-in-rigion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/sphere-bio-expands-apac-distribution-network-network-to-strengthen-presenthen-presence-in-presence-in-region.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87D93716-B957-414A-414A-A6F4-5435831BBA15 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 07:17:00 -0400 Sphere Bio expands APAC distribution network to strengthen presence in region
流动化学系统的电子可调的背压调节器Vapourtec的开拓性EBPR是一种创新的，具有电子可调的背压调节器，不需要任何外部参考气压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/electronally-avustable-back-pressure-regulator-gregulator-for-for-for-flow-chemistry-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/electronally-Adjustable-back-pressure-regulator-gresulator-for-for-for-flow-chemistry-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfd7169f-9f-9f54-40dd-8902-B76CF42D42D3 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 07:12:00 -0400
该法案旨在帮助消防员患有癌症。通过它可以通过。当消防员于一月份与洛杉矶县的灾难性大火作斗争时，加利福尼亚州的参议员亚当·席夫（Adam Schiff）和亚历克斯·帕迪拉（Alex Padilla）以一个简单的目的签署了立法：向诊断出患有服务相关癌症的急救人员提供联邦援助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/this-bill-aims-to-help-firefighters-with-cancer-getting-it-passer-passed-is-is-just-just-just-the-beginning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/this-bill-aims-to-help-firefighters-withcancer-getting-it-pass- it-passed-is-is-just-just-the-beginning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=431c6d1f-a4c2-4737-8ad6-c3c0b79642c3 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 07:01:35 -0400 This bill aims to help firefighters with cancer. Getting it passed is just the beginning.
